description.title: Hardhat: deploy then transfer ownership and upgrade through transparent proxy
description.purpose:
Executes a hardhat script to deploy an upgradeable contract via a transaprent proxy, and then transfer ownership of that proxy to another user. A second hardhat script is then used to upgrade the constract to a new version by the new owner. Note that the use of @openzeppelin/contracts-upgradeable is to allow the storage contract to be initialised with a first value (you can not set directly with proxies).
Skipped due to https://github.com/ten-protocol/ten-internal/issues/3875
